action.action-desc: Mr. Padilla (for himself and Mr. Hoeven) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize additional funding for the San Joaquin River Restoration Settlement Act.

section.header: Additional funding for the San Joaquin River Restoration Settlement Act

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations To implement Settlement
subsection.text: Section 10009 of the San Joaquin River Restoration Settlement Act (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1355) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by striking $250,000,000 and inserting $750,000,000; and
in subsection (b)(1), by striking $250,000,000 and inserting $750,000,000.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations for Friant Division improvements
subsection.text: Section 10203(c) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1367) is amended by striking $50,000,000 and inserting ‘‘$75,000,000”.
